column1: Smoque BBQ////   I do not mind sharing my food
column2: especially when I am drinking.  But
column3: for Christs sake! don't eat it all!!!!  For 4 of us
column6: st. louis style ribs and brisket. Sounds like it should be enough food
column7: but not for my friends!! I only wanted brisket
column8: and maybe a bite of corn bread to soak up some of the alcohol....  Good thing I did not want to try everything
column9: it would not have been possible!  But
column10: everyone smiled when accused of being pigs
column11: and then raved about how great it was!
